page.title: 09Curry Rivel Brownie Pack
page.content: I like Brownies because you play games and go out and explore. I am 8 at the moment. I was 7 when I started. I am in one of the sixes called the Imps. I have passed 2 Brownie badges already. I have got my Hostess and Cooks badges. For the Hostess badge you have to welcome and look after a guest or guests at your own home or at a party, prepare at least some of the refreshments yourself and make a flower arrangement. For the Cooks badge you had to make tea and toast, boil an egg, cook bacon or sausages, cook some potatoes and one other vegetable and make scones or small cakes. A Brownie Pack is divided into small groups called 'Sixes'. They each have the name of a type of Brownie. Here are some of the names; Elves, Pixies, Gnomes, Sprites,and Scottish Kelpies.
